room_title: Escape room "Prison" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: My friends and I did the Prison room and we loved it! It was very challenging, but the staff was very nice, accommodating, and helpful. I definitely recommend checking this place out!

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: My son decided to do an escape room for his birthday. Good price for the five of us and easy booking. Upon arrival, the level of customer service was amazing. Heidi our game maker was full of energy, friendly, set up the scene perfectly, and left us wanting to come back for more! We went through the Prison room and it definitely had its challenging moments but worth every second.

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: We loved the prison. While we didn't make it out, we had a blast! Will be returning to do the other 2 rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: My family and I went tonight and completed the Prison room in 35 min! It was AWESOME! Anyone looking for a fun group outing, I highly recommend PaniQ Room!

room_title: Escape room "Prison" by PanIQ Escape Room Chicago in Chicago
review: Great time! Did the prison for my very first experience. At first I was actually very skeptical, but truly enjoyed the experience, unique time for team building! I want to go back to try the other rooms.
